sentences.en: Bridal mother understands everything to want successful, be in adjoining room eavesdrop.
sentences.cn: 新娘的母亲为了要了解一切是否顺利, 便在隔壁房间偷听.

sentences.en: He ensconced himself in the closet in order to eavesdrop.
sentences.cn: 他藏在壁橱里,以便偷听.

sentences.en: I could have sworn several people behind us were walking close enough to eavesdrop.
sentences.cn: 我可以肯定,我们后面有好几个人跟得非常近,可以偷听到我们说的话.

sentences.en: I didn't mean to eavesdrop but I heard what's going on.
sentences.cn: 我并不是有意偷听但我都听到了.

sentences.en: It is not polite to eavesdrop on the conversation of other people.
sentences.cn: 偷听他人说话是很不礼貌的.

sentences.en: No, I'm not gonna do this, okay ? I'm not gonna eavesdrop on my friend.
sentences.cn: 噢, 我不会那么做的. 我不会偷听我朋友的.

sentences.en: Phoebe : Oh , I'm not gonna do this, okay? I'm not gonna eavesdrop on my friend.
sentences.cn: 噢, 我不会那么做的, 好吧? 我不会偷听我朋友的.

sentences.en: She ensconced herself in the closet in order to eavesdrop.
sentences.cn: 她藏身于壁橱里,以便偷听.

sentences.en: Suddenly found a group of animals in ji ji cooing with what, then go to eavesdrop.
sentences.cn: 突然发现一大群小动物围在一起叽叽咕咕说着什么, 便去偷听.

sentences.en: The only way to find out is eavesdrop on the conversations my mom and dad had.
sentences.cn: 5年过去了,我开始对我的祖国所发生的一切感到好奇,我了解中国的唯一途径就是偷听父母的谈话.

sentences.en: There was Helena eavesdropping outside the door.
sentences.cn: 海伦娜当时在门外偷听。

sentences.en: They're amazingly consistent if you eavesdrop on them during interviews: You'll hear plain, neutral, bland questions.
sentences.cn: 如果你偷听他们的采访,你会吃惊于他们的始终如一的风格: 你会听到朴素的 、 中立的 、 温和的问题.

sentences.en: Vernon zhong: you eavesdrop on the conversation of your uncle and me?
sentences.cn: 仲天骐: 你偷听我和你舅舅说话?

sentences.en: Walking slowly because you're afraid we'll eavesdrop, aren't you? "
sentences.cn: 走得慢吞吞的,怕我们听见, 是不是? ”

sentences.en: Xia zhi xing: i just passed by by chance not eavesdrop.
sentences.cn: 夏之星: 我只是刚好经过,不是偷听.

trans.tran_en: to deliberately listen secretly to other people’s conversations
